summary: A simple ponytail for female characters.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Description:[/b]
I was unable to find a simple ponytail among the tons of hair mods out there, so I\'ve decided to make my own. Based on my own tastes, as always. So it will be not good for everyone. Especially beta version.

[b]Installation and use:[/b]
Install with NMM or just drop the \"Data\" folder from the archive to the your Skyrim root folder and check in the Data files.
Use: select it like any other hairstyle in the Character Creator. Should be after all default styles for humans and elves and one before last for cats.

[b]Known issues:[/b]
It\'s my first model export to Skyrim, so I\'ve encountered some weird glitches: texture somehow become transparent to shadows (see pic), and mesh slightly moved after I\'ve assigned it to a bone and exported.
If someone more skilled than I knows how to fix that - feel free to comment :P
Of course any other suggestions are welcome as well :)
[URL=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/26577-1-1352371176.jpg][IMG]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/26577-1-1352371176.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Besides that two glitches it looks not that bad IMO, so it\'s ready to use. Beta version though.

[b]Version history:[/b]
beta.r3 - Added Khajiit support.
beta.r2 - Added smooth hairline above the forehead and temples.
beta - That was a start :) And believe me, alpha version was far worse :D

[b]Special thanks:[/b]
Keep in mind that my bosmer lookin\' so good because of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24273]Ethereal Elven Overhaul[/url] and I\'m in love with that mod, be sure to check it out :P
Also check out incredible modelling tutorials by [url=http://newvegas.nexusmods.com/mods/46696]Arenovalis/Millenia[/url] and [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/NightasyTutorials]Nightasy[/url] - they\'re just awesome.
author: Utherien
